description:
Jill Grantz is the third princess of the Grantz Grants and Luna`s childhood friend. Officially Luna`s master, but away from official functions she is more informal and friendly having known Luna since childhood.
On the return journey from the ceremony knighthood, she and her bodyguards are attacked by bandits and she is held captive. She is then tortured and sexually broken by the villains who desire the undoing of the seals protecting the Grandora ruins.
name: Jill Grants
